title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 219-4.7 - Inspection and maintenance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 219-4.7 - Inspection and maintenance

State Regulations

The owner or operator of a crematory facility must
inspect each cremation unit at that facility at least once per calendar year. The facility owner or operator shall perform all necessary repairs and routine
maintenance in order to ensure that each cremation unit, monitoring device, and
control device is operated and maintained in accordance with manufacturer's
instructions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
219-4.7

Amended

New

York State Register March 4, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 9, eff. 3/14/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
